item.title: By: Stephane Daury
item.dc:creator: Stephane Daury
item.description:
On afraid.org: I hate to draw conclusions like this, but... I signed up with them after posting the above, with a special email/password combo I use on services I'm unsure of, and also use for a Microsoft Live account (which I do not use). The latter is a common attack vector when people score your password (like FB and Twitter). Sure enough, my MS Live account was accessed by someone else within the hour, with those very creds (they do detection)...
Might be a coincidence. But if it is, it's a big one...
item.content:encoded:
On afraid.org: I hate to draw conclusions like this, but… I signed up with them after posting the above, with a special email/password combo I use on services I’m unsure of, and also use for a Microsoft Live account (which I do not use). The latter is a common attack vector when people score your password (like FB and Twitter). Sure enough, my MS Live account was accessed by someone else within the hour, with those very creds (they do detection)…

Might be a coincidence. But if it is, it’s a big one…
